mil3.4.10:4.2: “bhante nāgasena, yo na labhati nibbānaṃ, jānāti so ‘sukhaṃ nibbānan’”ti?
mil3.4.10:4.3: “Āma, mahārāja, yo na labhati nibbānaṃ, jānāti so ‘sukhaṃ nibbānan’”ti.
mil3.4.10:4.5: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, yesaṃ nacchinnā hatthapādā, jāneyyuṃ te, mahārāja, ‘dukkhaṃ hatthapādacchedanan’”ti?
mil3.4.10:4.8: “Aññesaṃ, bhante, chinnahatthapādānaṃ paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā jānanti ‘dukkhaṃ hatthapādacchedanan’”ti.
mil3.4.10:4.9: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yesaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ, tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā jānāti ‘sukhaṃ nibbānan’”ti.
